content.rendered:
UNPACKING AND ASSEMBLING THE CARBON E-BIKE

CARBON
support & maintenance


Removing the cardboard

Checking for damages

Unwrapping the wheels and the e-bike

Starting the assembly procedures (handlebar, front wheels, pedals)

Download the EggRider App

Connect the front and rear lights
